prompt: Change the lightbox text from 'I HATE NOTHING ABOUT U' to text with the same meaning
knowledge_prompt: The task is a semantic rewording on a lit sign. The new phrase must convey the same affectionate meaning as “I HATE NOTHING ABOUT U,” expressing complete acceptance or love without criticism. The replacement should stay concise, all-caps, and visually balanced on the lightbox while keeping the same glow, alignment, and perspective of the original illuminated sign.
